original_title: Fire breaks out at garbage dump in Mulleriyawa
original_body_lines: A fire broke out at a garbage dump in Kelanimulla, Mulleriyawa earlier today.
The Fire Department of the Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte Municipal Council had deployed two fire trucks to douse the fire.
According to our News 1st correspondent, the fire had spread over a large area.
